sentences.en: An conglomerate holds a major share in the company.
sentences.cn: 提议购买一公司的全部或大部分股票,目的是为了控制它.

sentences.en: Cuttings and core from the drill - holes have intersected conglomerate bands.
sentences.cn: 钻粉和岩心已穿过了砾岩夹层.

sentences.en: Fiat is Italy's largest industrial conglomerate.
sentences.cn: 菲亚特是意大利最大的产业集团。

sentences.en: His local bank, Bailey Savings and Loan , is owned by a conglomerate.
sentences.cn: 他的本地银行“贝利储贷银行”(BaileySavingsandLoan)目前属于一家集团企业.

sentences.en: Identity confirmed: shinobi mercenaries employed by the Nakatomi conglomerate.
sentences.cn: 身份确认: 中臣财团的忍者雇佣兵.

sentences.en: In Australia no exploitable uraniferous conglomerate has been discovered.
sentences.cn: 在澳大利亚,尚未发现可开采的含铀砾岩.

sentences.en: In the 1960 s investors were lured by the appeal of the conglomerate.
sentences.cn: 20世纪60年代,投资者受惑于大集团的吸引力.

sentences.en: Mergers fall into three categories: horizontal, vertical, and conglomerate.
sentences.cn: 合并分为以下三种: 横向合并, 纵向合并和混合合并.

sentences.en: Nakatomi conglomerate stole a shard of Akujiki, breaking the hell spawn seal.
sentences.cn: 中臣财团就是偷了恶食碎片, 然后破坏了式神的封印.

sentences.en: Proctor & am Gamble is a large personal product conglomerate.
sentences.cn: 宝洁 公司是一家生产个人卫生用品的大集团公司.

sentences.en: Sandstone and conglomerate are the consolidated equivalent of sand and gravel.
sentences.cn: 砂岩和砾岩分别是砂和砾石固结的产物.

sentences.en: The figures showed that cash was haemorrhaging from the conglomerate.
sentences.cn: 数据表明，这家集团的现金正在大量流失。

sentences.en: The food conglomerate Nestle SA paid for the study.
sentences.cn: 食品集团雀巢为这项研究提供资金.

sentences.en: The general manager of conglomerate is a lady of uncommon brilliance.
sentences.cn: 那家联合公司的总经理是一位非常有才华的女士.

sentences.en: Tyco International Ltd. is a conglomerate which a component of the SP 500.
sentences.cn: TycoInternational股份有限公司是一家集团企业,其股票是标准普尔500指数成份股.

words.tran_cn: 聚集（物）；团块；凝聚；混合物

trans.tran_cn: 联合大企业，砾岩，合成物，组合物
trans.tran_en: a large business organization consisting of several different companies that have joined together
